title: [docs] Grid lines for activation function plots
body_html:
Without them it's hard to understand the right asymptote of sigmoid, and the linear regime bounds (more of a pedagogical thing for new users)

https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/nn.html?highlight=multilabel_soft_margin_loss#torch.nn.Sigmoid

Even very light lightgray dotted grid lines would be nice
